item.title: Added Qonversion.io
item.description: http://qonversion.io/ - All-in-one cross-platform subscription management platform offering analytics, A/B testing, Apple Search Ads, remote configs, and growth tools for optimizing in-app purchases and monetization. Compatible with iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, Cordova, Stripe, and web. Free up to $10k in monthly tracked revenue.

item.title: Added Hydrozen.io
item.description: https://hydrozen.io - Uptime monitoring & Status pages, Free plan: 10 Uptime monitor, 5 heartbeat monitors, 1 Domain monitor and 1 Statuspage free.

item.title: Remove the tracking codes in the link for MarsCode
Added insomnia to ##APIs, Data, and ML
item.description: https://insomnia.rest - Open-source API client for designing and testing APIs, it supports REST and GraphQL

item.title: Added Statsig to Feature Toggles Management Platforms section
item.description: https://www.statsig.com - A robust platform for feature management, A/B testing, analytics, and more. Its generous free plan offers unlimited seats, flags, experiments, and dynamic configurations, supporting up to 1 million events per month.

item.title: Updated contributor count to reflect current state
item.description: https://github.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev - from Pull Requests, reviews, ideas, and work done by 1600+ people. You can also help by sending [Pull Requests](https://github.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev) to add more services or remove ones whose offerings have changed or been retired.

item.title: Add Hypertune to ## Feature Toggles Management Platforms
item.description: https://www.hypertune.com - Type-safe feature flags, A/B testing, analytics and app configuration, with Git-style version control and synchronous, in-memory, local flag evaluation. Free for up to 5 team members with unlimited feature flags and A/B tests.
